summary: Completely removes all radial blur and double vision fx\'s from the game also removes eye blind adaptation effect.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Byvbb.png?1[/img][/center]

[size=3]This little tweak that [u]completely removes all radial blur and double vision fx\'s[/u] from the game also removes eye blind adaptation effect. I did this for myself, because my PC (runs skyrim like crap) is very old so I wanted to increase fps on combat as much as possible. When I didn\'t find any way to permanently shut these effects in ini settings I decided to take a look in Creation Kit. Simple blur and DOF is unaffected.[/size]
author: Holugar
